fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Entertain (Night): Choose a target. They will be roleblocked tonight.
- Advanced Entertainment (Night, 1 use): Choose a target. They will be roleblocked through immunity.
- Public Show (Night, 1 use): Roleblock anyone visiting an Unseen member tonight.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you end up target an Unseen member with Entertain or Advanced Entertainment, your ability will fail.
- You are roleblock immune.
